markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Form Lock (Wrestler)](/Feats.aspx?ID=3405) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Attack" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=15" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 127</row>

**Archetype** [Wrestler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=127)

**Prerequisites**
[Wrestler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3394)

**Requirements**
You have a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33).

</column>

---

Your ability to manipulate your enemy's body is potent enough that you can tear and break apart alternate forms. Attempt an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) a [polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127) effect currently affecting the creature you have grabbed or restrained. If the target is somehow under the effect of multiple polymorph effects, you can choose which one to attempt to counteract; the GM chooses randomly if the separate effects aren't obvious. The target is then temporarily immune for 1 day.
name: Form Lock (Wrestler)
requirement: You have a creature  grabbed  or  restrained .
